mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME ,USER_NICKNAME ,USER_GRADE ,USER_TYPE,USER_PHONE ,USER_ADCHK ,USER_TCHK,TO_CHAR(USER_REGDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') USER_REGDATE FROM "USER" WHERE USER_SEQ = #{user_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE "USER" SET USER_GRADE ='T' ,USER_TCHK='Y' WHERE USER_SEQ =#{user_seq} AND USER_TCHK='N'
UPDATE "USER" SET USER_TYPE ='H' WHERE USER_SEQ IN (SELECT USER_SEQ FROM USER_LOG WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE)-LAST_LOGIN >'365')

UPDATE "USER" SET
USER_ADCHK ='Y' WHERE USER_SEQ =#{user_seq} AND USER_ADCHK ='N'
USER_ADCHK ='N' WHERE USER_SEQ =#{user_seq} AND USER_ADCHK ='Y'

UPDATE "USER" SET
USER_GRADE ='T'
USER_GRADE ='M'
WHERE USER_SEQ =#{user_seq} AND USER_TCHK ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME , TO_CHAR(TEA_DATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TEA_DATE , NVL(TEA_HANDATE,'확인중') FROM "USER" NATURAL JOIN TEACHER_CHK WHERE USER_TREQ ='Y' AND USER_TCHK ='N'

SELECT USER_SEQ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME , TO_CHAR(TEA_DATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TEA_DATE , NVL(TEA_HANDATE,'확인중') FROM "USER" NATURAL JOIN TEACHER_CHK WHERE USER_TREQ ='Y' AND USER_TCHK ='N' AND USER_SEQ =#{user_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TEACHER_CHK SET TEA_HANDATE =SYSDATE WHERE USER_SEQ = #{user_seq}
